properties.description: This policy enforces naming conventions for Azure Function Apps. Function App names must follow organizational standards for consistency and identification. The default pattern expects names following the format: func-{env}-{app}-{instance} (e.g., func-dev-api-001). Function App names must be globally unique as they are used in the default azurewebsites.net domain.
properties.displayName: Enforce Naming Convention for Function Apps

metadata.description: The effect determines what happens when the policy rule is evaluated to match
Regular expression pattern that Function App names must match. Default: func-{env}-{app}-{instance} (e.g., func-dev-api-001, func-prod-payment-002)
